title: This is why you should play support more often :D

replies.body: I've tried this type of thing against many different team comps, support type champions can do this because of one factor. CC. A full team of support-type champions can lock down not just 1 or 2, but entire teams and deal enough damage to either force a disengage, or pick up kills. The people you play against don't matter. Their skill doesn't matter. A 12 second CC chain that can't be dodged once the first one lands means no matter how much skill you have, you will die.

No {{item:2049}} 
You're exiled from the support train.

Omg your teamwork is out of orbit, those assists ...

My guess is you could win even if you had actual opponents.
Would've helped if their Diana didn't build flat HP all the way across lol

> [{quoted}](name=Valkyrie Witch,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=Ot0zN1Zl,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-03-23T06:57:32.317+0000)
>
> Would've helped if their Diana didn't build flat HP all the way across lol

Yeah, after losing lane horrendously to annie, she decided to build troll.

Blade of the ruined king on leona....

I need to try that out.

3 champions on the enemy team comp are easily kitable. Supports can do that nicely, Their Diana had no clue how to build and probably sucked, And Kalista is actually not to hard to catch out of position with Leona's R or a sneaky grab from Blitz.

All in all, if you were against competent opponents, this would have went alot differently.
You played against a god awful team comp. Your point being?
anybody else try to click the multiple x buttons?

{{champion:161}}'s my hidden god support.

Sometimes I get 20 kills (How can you *not* ks with this guy?). 

Sometimes I get 20 assists. (I kill steal and secure :D)
My brother had an all-top lane team. They won before 20.
Anything works in low elo if you play decently enough.  The opposing team was not a very skilled one.
Yeah cause this will work every time. You got lucky and played against a bad team.
Hey. Luck and skill are only 30% of the battle.
